comment: Addition to zero. Remark in proof of Theorem 4K(2) of [Enderton] p. 81. Note: In this and later theorems, we deliberately avoid the more general ordinal versions of these theorems (in this case ~ oa0r ) so that we can avoid ~ ax-rep , which is not needed for finite recursive definitions.
